mapper.insert: insert into UploadFileInfo (Type, RelationTableName, RelationID, FilePah, FileName, ExtendName, FileSize, CreaetUserID) values (#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{relationTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relationID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filePah,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extendName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creaetUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update UploadFileInfo set Type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RelationTableName = #{relationTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RelationID = #{relationID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FilePah = #{filePah,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FileName = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ExtendName = #{extendName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FileSize = #{fileSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreaetUserID = #{creaetUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER} where RecID = #{recID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select RecID, Type, RelationTableName, RelationID, FilePah, FileName, ExtendName, FileSize, CreateTime, CreaetUserID from UploadFileInfo where RecID = #{recID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select RecID, Type, RelationTableName, RelationID, FilePah, FileName, ExtendName, FileSize, CreateTime, CreaetUserID from UploadFileInfo
